name: capacitor-plugin-cashfree-pg
description: A modern Capacitor plugin for Cashfree Payment Gateway with official API contract support
author: Kishan Kumar Maurya

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: sh -c 'command -v pod >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "CocoaPods not installed; skipping iOS verification."; exit 0; }; pod lib lint CapacitorPluginCashfreePg.podspec --allow-warnings --skip-tests || echo "pod lib lint failed (ensure version tag exists and network/specs reachable)."'
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- --fix --format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
